sentences.en: At a time when the network newsmagazines are close to being overrun by tabloid sensationalism.
sentences.cn: 在这个时代,主要电视网上的新闻杂志节目中,小报式的煽动报道几乎已泛滥成灾.

sentences.en: He took great pains to write on his subject without a trace of sensationalism.
sentences.cn: 他尽力不带一丝哗众取宠的色彩来写作他的题材。

sentences.en: Lurid crimes. At other times it merely refers to glaring and usually unsavory sensationalism.
sentences.cn: 耸人听闻的罪行. 该词极少用来指怒目而视的并且通常是令人不快的危言耸听.

sentences.en: Reminiscence in practice and sensationalism in research break up the history relation of the theories.
sentences.cn: 实践中的“怀旧”和研究上的“追新”实际上割裂了理论的历史联系.

sentences.en: The report criticises the newspaper for sensationalism.
sentences.cn: 这篇报道批评了报纸哗众取宠的作风。

sentences.en: The tabloids relied on sensationalism to maintain their circulation.
sentences.cn: 那份小报以危言耸听来保持其销路.

sentences.en: There is so much tabloid sensationalism.
sentences.cn: 很多小报都在制造耸人听闻的报道.

sentences.en: They all sourced the problem by reference bias historic description with sensationalism.
sentences.cn: 他们都找到问题的描述与参考偏见具有历史意义的追求轰动效应.

sentences.en: They were an accident of my distraction and a product of news sensationalism.
sentences.cn: 这是我一时分心的失误,也是新闻效应的产物.
